text: Priscilla Joson Baltazar-Padilla (born Priscilla Joson Baltazar; July 2, 1958 â€“ August 27, 2021) was a Filipino politician and lawyer. She was the 188th Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the Philippines. She was nominated by President Rodrigo Duterte. Baltazar-Padilla was in office from July 16, 2020 until November 3, 2020. She was born in Manila. Baltazar-Padilla died on August 27, 2021 in Manila at the age of 63. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Lawyers from Manila Category:Politicians from Manila Category:Filipino judges
title: Priscilla Baltazar-Padilla
